Technician Job at Max Drive




        
    

        
        Max Drive - We are a team of passionate people and a leading technology-enabled company driven by a vision to solve the mobility challenges in Africa. We want to get people and goods to their destinations hitch-free. It is personal for us because we understand the frustration of epileptic transportation. We are making mobility safe, affordable, accessible, and sustainable through the deployment of high-performance technologies and operators.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Technician

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Job type: Contract

Description
     

            
    




	We are looking for a reliable and seasoned Technician - Motorcycle Rewire/ Motorcycle Mechanic/ Tricycle Mechanic - who will be responsible for promptly and efficiently maintaining the fleet of vehicles within the system. 
	The Ideal candidate will bring fresh knowledge of best practices, identify research needs in the technical space roadmap, actively manage and facilitate communications with stakeholders, and be responsible for supporting the ongoing development within the team. 


What You’ll Do


	Perform vehicle routine and corrective maintenance. 
	Assess and diagnose problems with faulty vehicles.
	Replace and repair  defective parts and materials.
	Efficiently maintain assets within agreed SLA
	Store and account for old and replaced parts.
	Generate maintenance reports.
	Work with other technicians to solve multifaceted problems.
	Verify vehicle serviceability by conducting test drives, adjusting controls and systems.
	Visit workshops during repair to ensure new and original spare parts are fixed on our vehicles
	Assistance in emergency rescue of MAX vehicles
	Provision of reports on every vehicle repair work
	Carry out periodic spare part price survey
	Report on activities within the workshop.


Requirements
What You’ll Need: 


	Good communication skills
	Experienced Motorcycle rewire or Motorcycle mechanic or Tricycle mechanics
	The ability to manage resources.


Benefits


	Competitive pay & benefits
	Premium Health insurance cover
	Consistent Learning and Development.
